question.ask: Questions 1~2  You want to buy a computer. You are now in front of the computers in a shop. You ask the shop assistant two questions.

std.value: Can you recommend a computer suitable for me? How much is it?
std.ai: Can you recommend a computer suitable for me? How much is it?

std.value: What’s special about this new computer? Could you show me how to use it?
std.ai: What’s special about this new computer? Could you show me how to use it?

std.value: Which computer is better, this one or that one? How much are they?
std.ai: Which computer is better, this one or that one? How much are they?

std.value: Are these computers suitable for middle school students? What do you suggest?
std.ai: Are these computers suitable for middle school students? What do you suggest?

std.value: How much is this one? Can I get a discount?
std.ai: How much is this one? Can I get a discount?

std.value: Do you have computers for high school students? How much are they?
std.ai: Do you have computers for high school students? How much are they?

std.value: What’s special about this computer? Is it expensive?
std.ai: What’s special about this computer? Is it expensive?

std.value: What is the difference between this one and that one? Which is better?
std.ai: What is the difference between this one and that one? Which is better?

std.value: Which one is best for middle school students? Can you give me some suggestions?
std.ai: Which one is best for middle school students? Can you give me some suggestions?

std.value: Which one is best for students? Can you give me some advice?
std.ai: Which one is best for students? Can you give me some advice?

std.value: Is this one good for students? How much does it cost?
std.ai: Is this one good for students? How much does it cost?

question.keywords: Can you recommend computer suitable for me How much is it|What’s special about this new computer Could you show me how to use it|Which computer is better this one or that one How much are they|Are these computers suitable for middle school students What you suggest|How much is this one Can I get a discount|Do you have computers for high school students How much|What’s special about this computer Is it expensive|What is difference between this one that one Which is better|Which one is best for middle school students Can you give some suggestions|Which one is best for students Can you give some advice|Is this one good for students How much it cost

std.value: How is the museum? What impressed you most?
std.ai: How is the museum? What impressed you most?

std.value: What are on display in the museum? Did you take any photos?
std.ai: What are on display in the museum? Did you take any photos?

std.value: What did you see in the museum? Is it allowed to take pictures in it?
std.ai: What did you see in the museum? Is it allowed to take pictures in it?

std.value: What do you think of the museum? Are there any interesting exhibits in it?
std.ai: What do you think of the museum? Are there any interesting exhibits in it?

std.value: What works of art are displayed in the museum? Are they impressive?
std.ai: What works of art are displayed in the museum? Are they impressive?

std.value: How is the museum? Do you like it?
std.ai: How is the museum? Do you like it?

std.value: How was your visit to the museum? Was it interesting?
std.ai: How was your visit to the museum? Was it interesting?

std.value: What are on show in the museum? Did you take photos?
std.ai: What are on show in the museum? Did you take photos?

std.value: How do you like the museum? Did you take photos?
std.ai: How do you like the museum? Did you take photos?

std.value: How do you like the museum? Was it impressive to you?
std.ai: How do you like the museum? Was it impressive to you?

std.value: What was the most impressive exhibit to you? Can you tell me about it?
std.ai: What was the most impressive exhibit to you? Can you tell me about it?

std.value: How were the works of art there? Were they created by famous artists?
std.ai: How were the works of art there? Were they created by famous artists?

std.value: What are on display there? Are there any works by world-famous artists?
std.ai: What are on display there? Are there any works by world-famous artists?

std.value: Did you take any photos there? If yes, can you show them to me?
std.ai: Did you take any photos there? If yes, can you show them to me?

std.value: What impressed you most in the museum? Can you describe it to me?
std.ai: What impressed you most in the museum? Can you describe it to me?

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your friend Dave just visited a new art museum in your city yesterday. You ask him two questions about it.
